title: Why Bitcoin holds the upper hand against CBDCs
description:
When FTX crashed in November 2022, it triggered a multi-billion dollar exodus spree, bringing Bitcoin down 22% in a single day. By the end of the month, the European Central Bank (ECB) fired an unusual shot across the crypto bow. As Bitcoin’s price stabilized, the central bank suggested this is Bitcoin’s “last gasp before the […]

The post Why Bitcoin holds the upper hand against CBDCs appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Chainlink (LINK) Launches Massive Update and Intensifies Partnerships with SWIFT, Vodafone, Swisscom, Deutsche Telekom, Citi Bank, and PWC
description: Chainlink has introduced a new staking platform with enhanced capabilities launching this year. Chainlink Staking v0.2 grants the community an avenue to contribute to the protocol’s functionalities. title: Crypto Market Watch: Bitcoin Breaks Barrier, Ethereum and Ripple on the Cusp of Key Moves
description: Bitcoin has successfully breached the $36,500 resistance, eyeing a move towards $40,000. Ethereum tests $1,900 resistance, with potential growth to $2,200 – $2,400, while Ripple aims to maintain support at $0.687, eyeing a rise to $0.9 – $1. title: Top Tokens to Watch in Q4: NEO, AAVE, and New Exciting Presale!
description: Ethereum ($ETH) enjoyed an explosive rally, and this relative strength signals that phase two has begun. Crypto veterans have seen the same pattern play out numerous times.
